name: Save'Em
description:
Save'Em - Created by éclairGames-AmeLovelyn

Help Your Friends get out of this Maze'd Mess Avoiding the Enemies, And Using the TeleportDoor to move to other rooms and Save All of Your FriendS!!!

*This is my First Game Ever Created, I know this isn't one of the top games you have ever played but the thought you had, to give it a try is everything to me. So Thank You whom that plays my game, you are free to give me any suggestions to further improve my game below(Please don't give me bad comments) And also comment which level was your most difficult?*

THANKS A LOT FOR PLAYING!

*UPDATE* There are some bugs that I've found in the game, I'm trying my best to resolve them.
